original_title: The Damned - Machine Gun Etiquette - 25th Tour
overview: Live performance from the reformed punk pioneers, recorded at the Manchester Academy in 2004 and featuring classic tracks such as 'New Rose' and 'Smash It Up'. Setlist celebrates the 25th anniversary of the 1979 release of the seminal Damned album, Machine Gun Etiquette.
title: The Damned - Machine Gun Etiquette - 25th Tour
